sentences: Kaugest kohast saabunud külalised istuvad laua ääres.
context: The Estonian word 'saabunud' is the past participle form of 'saabuma' meaning 'to arrive'. In this context, when combined with 'kauge' (distant/far), it refers to someone who has arrived from a distant place. It can be used to describe guests or visitors who have come from far away.
